articles.title: Bypolls Vote-Count In 3 Lok Sabha, 7 Assembly Seats Today: 10 Points
articles.description: Votes will be counted today in three Lok Sabha and seven assembly seats across five states and Delhi, where bypolls were held on June 23. Tripura Chief Minister Manik Saha is among the key candidates of the assembly by-election.
articles.content:
• Tripura bypolls was held on seats - Agartala, Jubarajnagar, Surma and Town Bardowali. Rajya Sabha MP Mr Saha, who contested from Town Bardowali, needs to win to continue as Chief Minister.

articles.title: Newsmaker | Among first to take up cause of Gujarat riot victims, Teesta is fighting many cases
articles.description: Teesta was among the first activists to take up the cases of riot victims in Gujarat in 2002, finally leading the SC to set up a special investigation team to probe the post-Godhra riots, six years later, under former CBI director R K Raghavan.
